title: Kamine von Green Knowe (Die)
notes: 2009 Julian Fellowes time-travel fantasy with Maggie Smith about boy discovering WWII secrets - based on Lucy M. Boston's Green Knowe novels

title: Kanzlei Liebling Kreuzberg (D' _Kultserie_/Trailer)
notes: 1986-1998 German TV series with Manfred Krug as West Berlin lawyer - cult legal dramedy about unconventional attorney
